# Prerequisites
 - working installation of Python or R
 - IDE: VS Code or RStudio
 - Basic understanding of time series concepts
 - R Packages: `forecast`, `tseries`, `ggplot2`, `zoo`, `xts`, `tsibble`, `fable`, `feasts`, `tidyr`, `dplyr`
